name: OFF Road Game Replay
summary: Learn about .RASUNSOFT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Rasunsoft OFF Road is an off-road racing game for Windows, which allows players to save and play replays of their races. These replays are saved as RASUNSOFT files.

However, RASUNSOFT files are not video files. Instead, RASUNSOFT files record the position of vehicles and actors throughout a race. OFF Road uses this data to construct and play back a video replay of that race.

instructions: You can use Rasunsoft OFF Road (Windows) to play the replay a RASUNSOFT file contains. However, OFF Road is discontinued and no longer available. Thus, if you do not already have access to OFF Road, you will not be able to play your RASUNSOFT file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
